com.twitter.sdk.android.core

Class OAuthSigning

  • Object
    • com.twitter.sdk.android.core.OAuthSigning

  • public class OAuthSigning
extends Object
    Provides convenience methods for generating OAuth headers for Twitter

      • getOAuthEchoHeaders

        public Map<String,String> getOAuthEchoHeaders(String method,
                                              String url,
                                              Map<String,String> postParams)
        Returns OAuth Echo header using given parameters. OAuth Echo allows you to securely delegate an API request to a third party. For example, you may wish to verify a users credentials from your backend (i.e. the third party). This method provides the OAuth parameters required to make an authenticated request from your backend.
        Parameters:
        method - The HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc).
        url - The url delegation should be sent to (e.g. https://api.twitter.com/1.1/account/verify_credentials.json).
        postParams - The post parameters.
        Returns:
        A map of OAuth Echo headers
        See Also:
        OAuth Echo

      • getOAuthEchoHeadersForVerifyCredentials

        public Map<String,String> getOAuthEchoHeadersForVerifyCredentials()
        Returns OAuth Echo header for verify_credentials endpoint.
        Returns:
        A map of OAuth Echo headers
        See Also:
        getOAuthEchoHeaders(String, String, java.util.Map)
